title: That Metal Show S11E06 HDTV 1080p (Sammy Hagar, Michael Anthony)
description:
Episodes of That Metal Show are finally being broadcast in HD on the Palladia channel.  Here is season 11 episode 6.  The guests are Sammy Hagar and Michael Anthony (Chickenfoot, Van Halen) with guest guitarist John 5 (Marilyn Manson, Rob Zombie), and a cameo by Steven Adler (Guns 'N Roses).

This video was captured directly from a digital cable box's HDMI output to MPEG4 in 1080i using a Game Capture HD and an HDMI splitter to remove HDCP.  HandBrake 0.9.9.5530 was then used to perform de-interlacing and reduction of the file size (without sacrificing much quality).  See below for complete technical specs on the video.
